page.title: 12Dairy Products-Manufacture
page.content: In our area there is a big dairy farm which makes{cream,cottage cheese and {yoghurt.}They started making cottage cheese and yoghurt fifteen years ago, but they have been making cream for thirty-five years.There are eighty acres of land and the building itself covers four or five acres.They have one hundred and ten workers at the farm.They buy milk from two hundred farmers and their cream goes all over the world.To make cottage cheese they put four and a half thousand gallons of milk into a vat,they add a starter and it turns the milk into cheese.They leave it in the vat for twelve hours and it goes solid.They have warm water running round the sides of the vat to cook it.They wash it in cold water and then it gets dried.After drying single cream and salt are added before being packed in plastic cartons.
